name: Freddy Frog 2
description:
Overview


Freddy Frog returns on his mission to be the highest frog in the world.
This frog just wants to keep jumping and you need to guide his hopping legs onto the next available platform.

Be careful. These platforms are not what they seem and a fall from a great height is not good for Freddy Frog.

Collect flies for extra points and avoid deadly wasps as you navigate treacherous procedurally generated platforms to get Freddy to the top of the high score table.

How high can you go?

This game is simple to understand but will test your platforming skills and ability to think fast.

Features


Procedural platform and enemy generation will ensure no 2 play throughs are the same.
Simple game mechanics for quick pick up and play fun.
Stylized 3D model retro themed graphics.
Arcade style gameplay.
Online High Score Leaderboard.
